initialization.content: Generate a random statement. This statement can either be true or false. I will guess either 'true' or 'false'. If I input 'false', I am guessing that the statement is ficticious and indeed false. If I guess 'true', I am guessing that the statement is a fact and is indeed true. When you receive my answer, output either 'correct' if I make a correct guess (E>G. guess - true; actual answer - true) or 'incorrect' if my guess is wrong (E.G. guess - false; actual answer - true). After outputting 'correct' or 'incorrect, output the explanation to the statement.
